name: SORA Synthetic USD
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: XSTUSD is an algorithmic stablecoin from the SORA (XOR) network. XST is a synthetic asset backed by a variable amount of XOR and pegged to a target index (e.g., a currency). XOR is minted/deminted to always guarantee the value of the pegged index. The first index implemented is linked to the value of DAI and is called XSTUSD.
